GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.10.143
GSD.description:
netfilter: nf_tables: clean up hook list when offload flags check fails

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.143 by commit 910891a2a44cdc49efcc4fe7459c1085ba00d0f4, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit d54725cd11a57c30f650260cfb0a92c268bdc3e0. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: netfilter: nf_tables: clean up hook list when offload flags check fails
